name: English US / weather.json
description: Localization strings for the Weather cog.
author: ScarlxtPink

data.weather.set.location.invalid_format.titl: Invalid location format. Please try again
data.weather.set.location.invalid_format.desc: Make sure to select a location from the autocomplete suggestions.
data.weather.set.location.success.title: Your Weather Location Updated
data.weather.set.location.success.description: Your weather location has been set to **{name}**.
data.weather.error.cooldown: You're doing that too much. Try again in {retry_after} seconds.
data.weather.error.invoke: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.
data.weather.set.units.success.title: Your Weather Settings Updated
data.weather.not_setup:
You have not set up your weather settings yet.
Use `/set weather <location>` to set your location and preferences.
data.weather.embed.title: {icon} Weather Forecast for {user}'s Location
data.weather.footer: Data provided by Open-Meteo | Powered by Chorus
